features.name: App Cloning
features.description: Clone installed apps to create parallel instances with isolated data

features.name: Virtual Space Management
features.description: Manage virtual spaces for app isolation and data separation

features.name: Data Isolation
features.description: Isolate app data using separate directories and databases

features.name: Security Management
features.description: Handle app security, encryption, and anti-tamper protection

features.name: Performance Optimization
features.description: Monitor and optimize app performance, memory usage

features.name: Home Screen
features.description: Main dashboard showing cloned apps and system information

features.name: App List Management
features.description: Display, search, and manage installed apps for cloning

features.name: Hooking System
features.description: Runtime hooking for app behavior modification

features.name: Code Obfuscation
features.description: Protect app code from reverse engineering

features.name: Statistics Tracking
features.description: Track app usage and performance statistics

features.name: Account Management
features.description: Manage multiple accounts for cloned apps
